javax.jcr
Class InvalidItemStateException

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Throwable
      java.lang.Exception
          javax.jcr.RepositoryException
              javax.jcr.InvalidItemStateException
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class InvalidItemStateException
extends RepositoryException

Exception thrown by the write methods of Node and Property and by Session.save() and Session.refresh(boolean) if an attempted change would conflict with a change to the persistent workspace made through another Session. Also thrown by methods of Node and Property if that object represents an item that has been removed from the workspace.

See Also:
